summary: VAANI Studio web app: live in production; next work is UI polish—compact balanced header and clean, minimal Apple-style landing page refinement (spacing, alignment, typography) with no new sections.
architectural_notes: Design direction: clean, minimal, premium Apple-style UI; prioritize whitespace and typography; no new landing page sections for now.

existing_features.title: Update the global header layout to feel slightly more compact and balanced (not cramped), with the VAANI logo aligned on the left and the login button/user controls aligned on the top-right with consistent breathing room across breakpoints.
Refine the Home (landing) page styling to a clean, minimal, premium Apple-style look using whitespace and typography (no heavy colors/clutter), while keeping the existing page structure and content.
Polish the Creator Zone card presentation to match the premium minimal direction (spacing, typography, and visual density) without changing the submission functionality or adding new features.
Deploy the updated frontend build for review and update the deployment verification checklist to include checks relevant to the header spacing and landing page polish.

new_feature_requests.summary: Polish header spacing: make header slightly more compact and balanced; VAANI logo left, login button top-right with clean breathing room; light/modern/premium feel.
Landing page polish: clean minimal Apple-style look—refine alignment, spacing, whitespace, typography, and hierarchy while keeping current structure (no new sections).
